name: Asteroids 3D (arsquid)
description:
Asteroids 3D is a game inspired by the 1979 arcade game "Asteroids"

The player controls a spaceship and fires lasers to destroy randomly appearing asteroids, and must keep moving to evade the attacks of a flying saucer. As the player accumulates points powerups will appear. As time passes the level count will progress, which means asteroids will appear more often, the flying saucer will fire at shorter intervals, and destroying asteroids will score more points.

Controls

  • Accelerate: W or Left Trigger
  • Turn: A & D or Left Stick
  • Fire: Left Click or Right Trigger
